short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temporary Email Address. Shield your primary email from spam with a disposable temp mail address.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Temp-Mail.info is a temporary email address service that delivers emails fast and secure to your temporary email address. Keep your primary email address safe and experience peace of mind with a temporary disposable email address.

Generate as many throw away email addresses as you wish and access your inbox with a single click from the extension.
